definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: be feeble, faint (Ba:ES 27 cp. Ar. 9at.ifa perish, flag);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יַעֲטׂף]] Ps 102:1, [[יַעֲטוֹף]] Is 57:16; Inf. cstr. [[עֲטׂף]] Ps 61:3; Pt. pass. (Ges:§ 50 f) pl. [[עֲטֻפִים]] Ge 30:42, [[עֲטוּפִים]] La 2:19; —lit. be feeble Ge 30:42 (J; opp. [[קְשׁוּרִים]]); [[הָעֲטוּפִים בְּרָעָב]] La 2:19; fig. ´[[רוּחַ מִלָּפָנַי יַע]] Is 57:16 the spirit would faint before me (´[[י]]); [[בַּעֲטׂף לִבִּי]] Ps 61:3, Ps 101:2 (title).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[בֵּעָטֵף עוֹלֵל]] La 2:11 when infants faint (for ´[[בְּהֵע]]; but read perh. [[בַּעֲטׂף]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[בְּהַעֲטִיף הַצּאׁן]] Ge 30:42 when the flock shewed feebleness.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּתְעַטֵף]] Ps 77:4, ´[[וַתִּת]] Ps 143:4, [[תִּתְעַטָָף]] Ps 107:5; Inf. cstr. [[הִתְעַטֵּף]] Ps 142:4, Jon 2:8, sf. [[הִתְעַטְּפָס]] La 2:12; —faint, faint away, La 2:12 ([[כֶּחָלָל]] like the wounded); subj. [[רוּחַ]] Ps 77:4, Ps 142:4 (+ [[עָלַי]], v. [[עַל]]
